synopsis.native: José y David rompieron hace unos meses después de muchos años de relación. Llevan unos meses sin verse, pero han decidido reunirse de nuevo en la isla de La Palma, el lugar donde se conocieron por primera vez.
synopsis.english: How to overcome true love? Jose considers David the man of his life, but when he suddenly breaks up with him after 8 years together, Jose is haunted by memories of their past relationship, which bring home to him that their life together wasn't as ideal as he once thought.
